divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my front porch looking directly to the west, about 10 decrease from the horizon I see an Bright Amberlight,(as bright as the brightest star in the sky) just appear in the sky. It was moving slowly to the north horizontal with the horizon at about the same speed most jetliners travel in the area. It then shot off at an superfast speed faster than a shooting star. It faded out in less than one second and could not be seen.I then said to my wife ( wow) did you see that. It was only visible for about 20 seconds. After it disappeared I ran into the house to get my night vision. I then scanned the sky trying to find it but could not.
